title: MAP_VALUE_EQUALS
description: Returns the corresponding return_value for the first compare_value equal to the provided object. If no values match, returns default_return_value_optional. If default_return_value_optional is omitted and no matches occur, the function returns $SKIP_ASSIGNMENT.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The object to compare against; it can be of any type.

parameters.name: … compare_value
parameters.description: The value to match exactly against the provided object.

parameters.name: … return_value
parameters.description: The value returned if the compare value matches exactly.

parameters.name: default_return_value_optional
parameters.description: The value returned if no compare values match. If omitted and no match occurs, returns $SKIP_ASSIGNMENT.

examples:
MAP_VALUE_EQUALS(Score, 100, "Perfect", 50, "Average", 0, "Fail", "No Match")
-- Returns "Perfect" if Score equals 100.
-- Returns "Average" if Score equals 50.
-- Returns "Fail" if Score equals 0.
-- Otherwise, returns "No Match".

tips.text: Ensure that the return_value and default_return_value_optional are of the same data type.
